name: Peasantlands
description:
Breaking New! The world has been invaded by an unknown source of hostile chickens.  These horrific chickens are demolishing left and right. It's every man for themselves. Good Luck!

---

The chickens have arrived and it is up to you to protect your house. However being the master summoner you are, you have the ability to summon as many peasants as you can to defend yourself from the horrific event. 

- Controls -

  • Left Click : Summon Peasant
  • Right Click : Rotate Camera

Show your support at my twitter: https://twitter.com/MattDUS14
